Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest mistake is trying to be more agreeable than you can be

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: An ambassador is not simply an agent; he is also a spectacle

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: Men who do not make advances to women are apt to become victims to women who make advances to them

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: No great work has ever been produced except after a long interval of still and musing meditation

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: A Parliament is nothing less than a big meeting of more or less idle people

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: An inability to stay quiet is one of the conspicuous failings of mankind

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: It is good to be without vices, but it is not good to be without temptations

Quote.Author: Walter Bagehot
Quote.QuoteValue: The cure for admiring the House of Lords is to go and look at it

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of storytelling is reaching its end because the epic side of truth, wisdom, is dying out

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: Gifts must affect the receiver to the point of shock

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: Genuine polemics approach a book as lovingly as a cannibal spices a baby

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: To be happy is to be able to become aware of oneself without fright

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: Opinions are a private matter. The public has an interest only in judgments

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every passion borders on the chaotic, but the collector's passion borders on the chaos of memories

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea that happiness could have a share in beauty would be too much of a good thing

Quote.Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote.QuoteValue: The camera introduces us to unconscious optics as does psychoanalysis to unconscious impulses

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything he's got

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: Objective journalism and an opinion column are about as similar as the Bible and Playboy magazine

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: The perils of duck hunting are great - especially for the duck

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: And that's the way it is

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as a little freedom. Either you are all free, or you are not free

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: Our job is only to hold up the mirror - to tell and show the public what has happened

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not educated well enough to perform the necessary act of intelligently selecting our leaders

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: In seeking truth you have to get both sides of a story

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: America's health care system is neither healthy, caring, nor a system

Quote.Author: Walter Cronkite
Quote.QuoteValue: Dan Rather and I just aren't especially chummy

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: I like people who take responsibility for their lives

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a crisis involving reading in certain communities

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: New York is my favorite city

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to tell kids flat out: reading is not optional

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never live to write all the stories I have in my head

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: As a child I wanted to be a professional athlete or lawyer

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: I would enjoy having dinner with the poet/playwright Derek Walcott

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: I talk to myself out loud at times, and feel embarrassed when people overhear me

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: With my writing, what I want to do is humanize the young people I write about

Quote.Author: Walter Dean Myers
Quote.QuoteValue: Children have adopted a consumerist attitude - I dare you to entertain me

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: How long it takes to write a book depends on its length

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Genre labels are useful only insofar as they help you find an audience

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I have to motivate myself much more than I had previously

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: The Rift, which was well over a thousand pages of manuscript, took two years

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be an author for as long as I can remember

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a writer was never a choice, it was an irresistible compulsion

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I now have to find a reason to write, every single day

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: For every SF reader of that period, Robert A. Heinlein was also a touchstone

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to college, though I didn't take many writing courses

Quote.Author: Walter Jon Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: When state and religion are one, religion becomes a means for the powerful to remain in power

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Time was God's first creation

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Being made in the image of God, man was the crown of creation

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: A creationist can embarrass an evolutionist by asking for a definition of species

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: We agree that man was not created to survive in space

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Angels possess greater powers than do human beings

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex is not sinful, but sin has perverted it

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Therefore, sins of sex are punished in this life to a greater degree than some other sins

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Any concept of one person being superior to another can lead to racism

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Accordingly, one race is neither superior nor inferior to another

Quote.Author: Walter Lang
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is not eternal but was created by God at the beginning

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: When men can no longer be theists, they must, if they are civilized, become humanists

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Where all men think alike, no one thinks very much

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Many a time I have wanted to stop talking and find out what I really believed

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Brains, you know, are suspect in the Republican Party

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: When all men think alike, no one thinks very much

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Private property was the original source of freedom. It still is its main ballpark

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: When philosophers try to be politicians they generally cease to be philosophers

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Ideals are an imaginative understanding of that which is desirable in that which is possible

Quote.Author: Walter Lippmann
Quote.QuoteValue: Industry is a better horse to ride than genius

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Hacking involves a different way of looking at problems that no one's thought of

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Once your IQ is 150 or over, it stops beings ability and becomes a disability

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: My left brain has gradually 'eaten' the right-brain capabilities away

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Flying down a tunnel of 1s and 0s is not how hacking is really done

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: There are kids going into chemistry and biology because of 'CSI.'

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: Bureaucracy kills people's ability to try new ideas

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: High IQ individuals don't like surprises and are pessimistic, because it's logical

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: A high IQ individual can't deal in an industry that's subjective

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: My personality is extremely unbalanced

Quote.Author: Walter O'Brien
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm left-brain dominant, so anxiety and nervousness don't affect me; most emotions don't

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: Men, like nails, lose their usefulness when they lose their direction and begin to bend

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: We often fancy that we suffer from ingratitude, while in reality we suffer from self-love

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambition is but avarice on stilts, and masked

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: My thoughts are my company; I can bring them together, select them, detain them, dismiss them

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: We think that we suffer from ingratitude, while in reality we suffer from self-love

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: Delay in justice is injustice

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: No ashes are lighter than those of incense, and few things burn out sooner

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: We talk on principal, but act on motivation

Quote.Author: Walter Savage Landor
Quote.QuoteValue: The Siren waits thee, singing song for song

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: O, what a tangled web we weave when first we practise to deceive!

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless a tree has borne blossoms in spring, you will vainly look for fruit on it in autumn

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: If a farmer fills his barn with grain, he gets mice. If he leaves it empty, he gets actors

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Look back, and smile on perils past

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: We build statues out of snow, and weep to see them melt

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Discretion is the perfection of reason, and a guide to us in all the duties of life

Quote.Author: Walter Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: An optimist is someone who gets treed by a lion but enjoys the scenery

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Today's gossip is tomorrow's headline

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip is the art of saying nothing in a way that leaves practically nothing unsaid

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually get my stuff from people who promised somebody else that they would keep it a secret

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: The same thing happened today that happened yesterday, only to different people

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: The only ones who like Milton Berle are his mother - and the public

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood is a place where they place you under contract instead of under observation

Quote.Author: Walter Winchell
Quote.QuoteValue: She's been on more laps than a napkin

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't understand why people really get upset about something that doesn't affect them at all

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are dogs. Men are dogs. We got to stop it. Men are not dogs. Uh-uh. Dogs are loyal

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems like when I first started, people got into comedy because they wanted to be good comedians

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually, I majored in marketing and I have a bachelor of science

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to get fired from the government. You have to, like, kill people

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here today because I hated everything else

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here today because I refused to be unhappy. I took a chance

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're passionate about your work, it makes the people around you want to be involved too

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: What drives the creative person is that we see it all

Quote.Author: Wanda Sykes
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a funny family, but none of them are remotely in show business

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Foreign politicians don't have resources - or limited resources. It's useless dealing with them

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Among the world's 500 largest companies, not one has completely relied on its own growth to develop

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The London property market has excellent investment opportunities

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The U.S., especially Hollywood, is so strong for film production

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in a family with a strong military background, so I chose to be a soldier

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The basic principle is I command, and my employees carry it out immediately

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't ally your personal interests with the development of the company

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The future of the world's film industry is in China because we have 1.3 billion people

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Chinese consumption, particularly high-end consumption, is booming

Quote.Author: Wang Jianlin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are only big in China, you are only a local Chinese company

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: My mission in life is to preserve craftsmanship

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always had a sense of curiosity and aspiration

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I take my work seriously, but I don't necessarily take myself seriously

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my passport. I plan trips very last minute, so I always carry it with me

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I like having a tailor everywhere because I am everywhere

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: My inspiration is love and history

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I create with my heart, so life and work inevitably intersect all too often

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I always like a good song: puts me in a good mood

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't do anything unless it's the absolute best

Quote.Author: Waris Ahluwalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I work with gold that holds history, diamonds that see the future, and rubies that long for love

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders are people who do the right thing; managers are people who do things right

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: The manager accepts the status quo; the leader challenges it

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders keep their eyes on the horizon, not just on the bottom line

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: The manager asks how and when; the leader asks what and why

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Great things are accomplished by talented people who believe they will accomplish them

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Good leaders make people feel that they're at the very heart of things, not at the periphery

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: Failing organizations are usually over-managed and under-led

Quote.Author: Warren Bennis
Quote.QuoteValue: The manager has his eye on the bottom line; the leader has his eye on the horizon

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are often a lot less vindictive than women are, because we are rejected constantly every day

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: If a man belittles a woman, it could become a lawsuit. If women belittle men, it's a Hallmark card

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's face it: men do a lot of things in the workplace that women just don't do

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Men have not stacked the decks against women

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: A man perceives himself as owning and being owned by a woman

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: In our society, the sound of men complaining is like nails on a chalkboard

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Every movement has radicals. But the important thing is that the radicals are not the leaders

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I've gone from being quite wealthy, when I was defending women, to being quite poor defending men

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to wealth is not what we earn. It is in what is spent on us

Quote.Author: Warren Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminists have confused opportunity with outcome

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the cool thing is doing things that could only be done in gaming

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: In cartoons, in movies, time passes differently. There are flashbacks and flashfowards

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: Gamers are everywhere, coming in all ages and genders, and developers have grown up, too

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're dealing with a new platform, the real trick is just getting the game running

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to take 'Ultimata Underworld' and literally update the graphics

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids, adults, men, women, everybody has a relationship with Mickey Mouse

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: I make M-rated games for adults, you know, with guys wearing sunglasses at night and trench coats

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in pushing things too far and forcing people to pull you back

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's always room for more innovation and new things

Quote.Author: Warren Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never made a game that wasn't explicitly about empowering players to tell their own story

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't learn so good, no matter how good the teacher is

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll sleep when I'm dead

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, I don't like, um, I'm not interested in rock 'n' roll piano. I find it a little grating

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no guitar technique

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: But there's a thin line between songwriting and arranging

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy every sandwich

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I don't think it ever did, but in the early '60s I got interested in folk music

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: My first album is like a terrible John Hammond album, with drums

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: Glenn Gould was my hero. Glenn Gould was my idol. I loved him

Quote.Author: Warren Zevon
Quote.QuoteValue: Dylan doesn't have to make Blonde On Blonde every time

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: They who drink beer will think beer

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Great minds have purposes; others have wishes

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had it with you and your emotional constipation!

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the greatest and simplest tools for learning more and growing is doing more

Quote.Author: Washington Irving
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman's whole life is a history of the affections

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see myself as a personality. I'm just another little guy

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: A deal is like chasing a girl. You work on it until she says, 'Yes,' for a date

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't buy cars I can't drive

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: Dolphins games always have been among the most popular NFL telecasts in England

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't make any money sitting in traffic

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: I busted my butt all my life building companies

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to accomplish twice as much, you have to work twice as hard

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: People always want cars. It's a huge industry, and there's always new product coming out

Quote.Author: Wayne Huizenga
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see myself ever selling Republic or AutoNation

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Look first at management. That's the key to a company

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are an entrepreneur, you have to think outside of the box

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: People will always want a free lunch

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Entrepreneurs bring to business... creativity

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a big cry in California to stop everyone from running to Canada

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: People in Hollywood are going make pictures where ever it's the least expensive to make them

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I loved MASH. As we are sitting here now talking, it's playing somewhere in the world

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: The rehearsal is where it all happens for an actor

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: When your in the movie business you have a start date and a stop date

Quote.Author: Wayne Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not hiding anything. What you see is what you get

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming a dad means you have to be a role model for your son and be someone he can look up to

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I love football, I've never really taken an interest in anything else

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I look up to any players. Obviously you respect everyone

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Just to confirm to all my followers I have had a hair transplant. I was going bald at 25 why not

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I play the game as honestly as I can. If the referee gives a penalty there is nothing you can do

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I might have faults but I'm not a big head

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Barbados, it's really relaxing

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming a dad was the proudest moment of my life. Playing football does not even compare

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I just hate losing and that gives you an extra determination to work harder

Quote.Author: Wayne Rooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I've matured since joining United, on and off the field

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Better than any argument is to rise at dawn and pick dew-wet red berries in a cup

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot comprehend what comprehends us

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: To be interested in food but not in food production is clearly absurd

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: The latest technology is not always good for anything except to the producers of the technology

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: We learn from our gardens to deal with the most urgent question of the time: How much is enough?

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not from ourselves that we learn to be better than we are

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: If we can't afford to take good care of the land that feeds us, we're in an insurmountable mess

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: For any sin, we all suffer. That is why our suffering is endless

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a good life, and was born to and among people I've admired and loved

Quote.Author: Wendell Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a writer more than I am a talker

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Eternal vigilance is the price of liberty; power is ever stealing from the many to the few

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is anything in the universe that can't stand discussion, let it crack

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: The best education in the world is that got by struggling to get a living

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to be an orator, first get your great cause

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: What is defeat? Nothing but education. Nothing but the first step to something better

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart is the best reflective thinker

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Boredom, after all, is a form of criticism

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: We live under a government of men and morning newspapers

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Physical bravery is an animal instinct; moral bravery is much higher and truer courage

Quote.Author: Wendell Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: What gunpowder did for war the printing press has done for the mind

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's make sure that we are working for age-appropriate sex education in our school system

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy in Lululemon, with a glass of red wine, watching HGTV

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Harvard was the most intimidating experience. I felt so out of my league there

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's face it, Obama is not a hugely popular political figure in the state of Texas

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I would be lying if I told you that I hadn't had aspirations to run for a statewide office

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been open about my life not because my story is unique, but because it isn't

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad is truly the person who always made me believe in myself, to appreciate that I was smart

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't accept that it's O.K. if only some kids get to go to college

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: I have super-supercurly hair, and it's a constant struggle

Quote.Author: Wendy Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: Texas is not really a red state - it's just a non-voting state

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: People are everything in education, just as in the corporate world
